attributes.action: Stop using animals in war and get out there and rescue DaGarwal
attributes.additional_details:
A Belgian Shepherd dog named DaGarwal was seized on a failed  SAS raid in Afghanistan in December 2013. Army sources said a rescue was 'unlikely' as it would risk soldiers' lives. Instead the PDSA said they might give DaGarwal an honorary medal.
If animals are being used I in war, then treat them as soldiers in their own right and get out there and rescue it. And after that, stop using animals and then abandoning or putting them down.
